title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
content: Genesis NFC Cards - Group BuyProducer: Plebtag.comDesign: Mx12ArtMaterial: NFC cardsAvailability: The first Genesis edition will be an open edition (close xx.xx.2023)Discount: Get a card for 10.06 EUR when you buy 100 (regular price is 16-18 EUR)How to Order:Payment will be accepted in Bitcoin. Once the group buy has reached the minimum quantity required to receive the discounted price, the producer will begin production and mx12 shipping. The cards will be numbered and hand-signed by the mx12 as a premium feature.Shipping:The producer is located in the Germany and will be able to ship to customers within the worldwide. Shipping fees will be added to the total cost of the cards.*EU: 4.90 EUR*Worldwide: 10 EUR (If the actual cost of shipping is lower than the quoted fees, the excess will be returned to you via the payment method used for your order.)p.s If it is more cost-effective, we will wait and send all of the cards together to a trusted person in the USA (minerjones) who will then ship the cards to the individual customers. This may potentially save on shipping costs.Thank you for considering participating in the Genesis NFC Cards group buy. We look forward to creating and delivering these unique and beautifully designed cards to the Bitcoin community.Order Form:1. [USERNAME] - [QUANTITY] cards2.
